How many people are affected by mucolipidosis type IV ?,"Mucolipidosis type IV is estimated to occur in 1 in 40,000 people. About 70 percent of affected individuals have Ashkenazi Jewish ancestry.",GHR,mucolipidosis type IV
What are the genetic changes related to mucolipidosis type IV ?,"Mutations in the MCOLN1 gene cause mucolipidosis type IV.
